page.title: 01 INTRODUCTION
page.content:
This block is part of the Bann Valley,a level area of fertile land liable to flooding in winter. The block can be divided into two main areas. 1.The new city of Craigavon. 2.Outskirts of Portadown. Much of the area has been developed over the past twenty years as part of the Craigavon developement.Expansion has virtually ceased and vested land is now being re-sold to farmers.
{Farming.}As much of the land is low lying a lot of money has been invested in land drainage.The land is excellent grassland.Few non-grass crops are grown.
{Roads.}There is an excellent network leading to the main motorway.
